description: Returns information about a specified configured audience model.

parameters.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model that you are interested in.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the configured audience model was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the configured audience model was updated.

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: audienceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the audience model used for this configured audience model.

nested_items.name: outputConfig
nested_items.description: The output configuration of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: Defines the Amazon S3 bucket where the configured audience is stored.

nested_items.name: s3Destination
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket and path for the configured audience.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location URI.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that can write the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: sharedAudienceMetrics
nested_items.description: Whether audience metrics are shared.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: minMatchingSeedSize
nested_items.description: The minimum number of users from the seed audience that must match with users in the training data of the audience model.

nested_items.name: audienceSizeConfig
nested_items.description: The list of output sizes of audiences that can be created using this configured audience model. A request to  StartAudienceGenerationJob that uses this configured audience model must have an audienceSize selected from this list. You can use the ABSOLUTE  AudienceSize to configure out audience sizes using the count of identifiers in the output. You can use the Percentage  AudienceSize to configure sizes in the range 1-100 percent.

nested_items.name: audienceSizeType
nested_items.description: Whether the audience output sizes are defined as an absolute number or a percentage.

nested_items.name: audienceSizeBins
nested_items.description: An array of the different audience output sizes.
(integer) ---
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: childResourceTagOnCreatePolicy
nested_items.description: Provides the childResourceTagOnCreatePolicy that was used for this configured audience model.
